name: Ping Phonk
description:
Welcome to Ping Phonk 

This game was made for the  Weekly Game Jam 163 in 3 days and it's also my first game jam :)

The AI is not easy to beat and is a bit... rude

[HOW TO PLAY]

Your main objective is to earn 200$ before your opponent do.

You can earn cash by hitting the ball and also by buying towers ($10) 

You can lose some by not hitting the ball and letting it go through the line.

Your turrets (on your left) earn you cash once you buy them, but they can get destroyed by ball.

Your opponent can also buy towers

[CONTROLS]

W/S or ArrowUp/ArrowDown - moving up or down

Use mouse to hover at spot for turret and then click it to buy one (10$)
